name: python3-rpds_py
build-commands: . /usr/lib/sdk/rust-stable/enable.sh && python3 -m venv .venv && . ./.venv/bin/activate && pip3 install /app/whl_tmp/tomli-2.0.1-py3-none-any.whl && pip3 install /app/whl_tmp/maturin-1.2.3-cp310-cp310-linux_x86_64.whl && cd rpds_py && python3 -m maturin build --offline -o /app/whl_tmp
